name: G4C Submission
description:
This game is meant to teach players and raise awareness about the overpopulation and endangerment of animals, as well as how humans play a factor in them. 

You are responsible for keeping the status of your fish in check by increasing the population of fish, or letting the fishermen decrease the population for you. Too much fish and your fish are overpopulated. Too little fish and your fish are endangered. No fish at all means your fish are extinct. 

----

 Here’s how to play: 

Press Space to spawn fish. 

Left click on the fishermen to drive them away. 

If your fish are overpopulated/endangered, you have 20 seconds to get the status back to normal or it is game over. 

If you have 0 fish, it is game over. If you maintain a normal status until 90 seconds, you win! 

Have fun, and thank you from Team VeggieQuad!
